SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ASpaceFomSimulation
The base class for simulations using the Vega framework.
EntityMapping
Bi-directional mapping between HLA object instance names and associated RTI handles.
EulerAngles
Euler Angle model.
EulerAngles.EulerSequence
 
ExCOComponent
The component type for storing data corresponding to the attributes of the SpaceFOM ExecutionConfiguration object instance as an ECS component.
ExCOConverter
This converter is used for translating the data in ExCOComponent to the respective attributes of the ExecutionConfiguration object class and vice versa.
ExecutionConfiguration
The archetypal representation of the SpaceFOM ExecutionConfiguration object used to assemble it upon discovery from the RTI.
ExecutionLatch
A global CountDownLatch object to resume/pause simulation execution.
ExecutionMode
An enum representation of the various execution modes supported in the SpaceFOM i.e., EXEC_MODE_INITIALIZATING, EXEC_MODE_RUNNING, EXEC_MODE_FREEZE, and EXEC_MODE_SHUTDOWN.
HLACallbackManager
Handles callbacks passed on from the RTI federate service thread.
HLAInteractionComponent
This component should be attached to an entity that is to be treated as an HLA interaction.
HLAInteractionManager
The HLAInteractionManager class enables sending interactions to the RTI.
HLAInteractionQueue
The interaction queue holds all incoming interactions from the RTI into an ArrayList.
HLAObjectComponent
This component should be attached to an entity that is to be treated as an HLA object instance.
HLAObjectManager
The HLAObjectManager enables the creation, update, and destruction of instances of an HLA object class.
HLASharingModel
Enum representation of the different types of data sharing mode for HLA object class attributes and interactions: Publish, Subscribe, and PublishSubscribe.
HLATimeManager
Handles HLA time management for the simulation.
IDataConverter
This interface should be used to provide instructions to the framework for how data from components should be translated to a single fixed HLA data type.
IEntityArchetype
An archetype essentially includes instructions for producing an entity with the set of components needed in the simulation.
IMultiDataConverter
This interface should be used to provide instructions to the framework for how data from components should be translated to a varying number of HLA data types.
InteractionClassProfile
A (meta-object) representation of an HLA interaction class.
Matrix3x3
3x3 Matrix model.
ModeTransitionRequest
The archetypal representation of the SpaceFOM ModeTransitionRequest interaction used to assemble it when received from the RTI.
MTRComponent
The component type for storing data corresponding to the SpaceFOM ModeTransitionRequest interaction.
MTRConverter
This converter can be used to translate the data in MTRComponent to the respective parameters of the ModeTransitionRequest interaction class and vice versa.
MTRMode
An enum representation of the various modes that can be transitioned to in the SpaceFOM i.e., MTR_GOTO_RUN, MTR_GOTO_FREEZE, and MTR_GOTO_SHUTDOWN.
ObjectClassProfile
A (meta-object) representation of an HLA object class.
ProjectLoader
Loader capable of parsing files that conform to the Vega Simulation Project Format (VSPF).
ProjectRegistry
The registry is effectively a database for storing associations of object and interaction class profiles, data converters, and remote HLA entities.
ProjectSettings
The stored settings to be used retrieved from the simulation's project file.
Quaternion
Quaternion model.
SpaceFomFederateAmbassador
The federate ambassador used by Vega simulations.
Vector3
Vector 3 model.
VegaUtilities
A collection of objects that are used internally by the framework and are generally available for use within Vega projects.
